enhanced_by.reason: Both methods modify the inner HTML of elements by adding HTML content, with 'append' adding at the end and 'prepend' at the start.
Both methods involve setting or modifying the HTML content of elements, though 'html' replaces the entire content while 'append' adds to it.
The 'html' method retrieves the combined inner HTML of all matched elements, which can be used to verify the effect of the 'append' method.
The 'outerHtml' method retrieves the combined outer HTML of all matched elements, which can be used to verify the effect of the 'append' method on the entire element structure.
